message.content:
cs.NI, cs.CR, cs.DS, cs.SY, cs.IT. 

This paper deals with security issues in wireless ad hoc networks, which are typically studied in the computer networks (cs.NI) and cryptography and security (cs.CR) sub-categories. The paper also proposes a mechanism to check the good forwarding of packets, which involves data structures and algorithms (cs.DS) and system and control theory (cs.SY). Finally, the paper evaluates the proposed solution using simulation, which involves information theory (cs.IT).
